SA01abhsubhu:3_4: śamathānukūlyaṃ punareṣu sthāneṣu kṛtakauśalasya niḥsaṃdehatayā yatheṣṭamālaṃbane aikāgrayayogena sukhaṃ cittasamādhānataḥ /

SA01abhsubhu:10_1: taddhātuvaddraṣṭavyaṃ tacca yathāyogamiti yena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyati yacca tadbījamityevamādi yojayitavyam /

SA01abhsubhu:17_3: saṃkleśataḥ sāmiṣādīnām, vyavadānato nirāmiṣādīnāṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam /

SA01abhsubhu:19_0_1: tatpūrvakatvāditareṣāmiti kāraṇajñāpanārthamāha - yayā kuśalatvāya cetayata ityevamādi /

SA01abhsubhu:20_4: ālaṃbane cittadhāraṇaṃ tatraiva punaḥ punarāvarjanaṃ veditavyam /

SA01abhsubhu:20_16: upapattiprātilambhikaṃ śrutacintāmayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ ca yathākramaṃ vipākāgamādhigamarūpaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:20_18: sthāmavānvīryavānutsāhī dṛḍhaparākramo 'nikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvityevamādisūtrapadāni yathākramaṃ saṃnāhādiṣvabhyutsāhavastuṣu yojayitavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:20_23: sāsravā dharmā āsravā āsravasthānīyāśca viṣayā iha veditavyāḥ /

SA01abhsubhu:21_5: nāstyayaṃ loko nāsti paraloko nāsti mātā nāsti pitā nāsti sattva upapāduka iti kriyāpavādaḥ,

SA01abhsubhu:26_1: tadyathā rajjuṃ sarpato gṛhṇāti kaścit sahasā,
SA01abhsubhu:26_2: na punā rajjuriti nirūpayaṃstāṃ sarpato gṛhṇīyāditi /
SA01abhsubhu:28_2: bahirdhāvikṣepaḥ śrutādikuśale prayuktasya tadālaṃbanādbahiḥ kāmaguṇeṣu cittagamanaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:28_4: nimittavikṣepaḥ pare māṃ guṇavattayā saṃbhāvayiṣyantītyetannimittametadartha kuśalaprayuktasya śanaiḥ tatparihāṇito veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:28_5: dauṣṭhulya vikṣepo 'haṃkārādidauṣṭhulyavaśādutpannotpanneṣu sukhādiṣu vediteṣvahaṃ mama asmīti vā karaṇāt kuśalapakṣāpariśuddhito veditavyaḥ /

SA01abhsubhu:29_13: [Abhidh-s-bh_9] paryeṣaṇākārā manaso 'bhijalpanā vitarkaḥ pratyavekṣaṇākārā manaso 'bhijalpanānuvicāra iti /
SA01abhsubhu:30_2: rāgapratipakṣo vairāgyam, tasya paripanthakaraṇam, tasya tena tadutpattāvantarāyakaraṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:31_0: cittaviprayuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmadhiṣṭhānataḥ svabhāvataḥ prajñaptitaśca nirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:32_3: apacaye sati mṛdubhiriti / prāptiḥ pratilambhaḥ samāgama iti prajñaptiriti prajñaptinirdeśaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:33_4: nirodha iti samāpatticittakṛtaḥ kālāntaramasthāvaracittacaittasamudācāranirodho āśrayasyāvasthāviśeṣo nirudhyate 'neneti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:33_7: ete ca samāpattī bhūmitaḥ manaskārato 'dhiṣṭhānataḥ svabhāvataḥ prajñaptitaśca nirdeṣṭe āsaṃjñikaṃ manaskāravarjairebhireva /
SA01abhsubhu:34_1: sthitikālaniyama iyantaṃ kālamanenāsmin nikāyasabhāge 'vasthātavyaṃ varṣaśataṃ varṣasahasraṃ veti karmakṛtaḥ sāmarthyaviśeṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:36_0: bāhyasyāpi rūpasya jātimattve nikāyasabhāgamātragrahaṇaṃ sattvasaṃtāne lakṣaṇaprajñaptijñāpanārtham /

SA01abhsubhu:36_3: ete ca jātyādayo na pratikṣaṇaṃ veditavyāḥ kiṃtarhi prabandhāvasthāsviti /
SA01abhsubhu:37_0: svabhāvādhivacanaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ devo manuṣya ityevamādi /
SA01abhsubhu:37_2: tadubhayāśrayeṣvi ti svabhāvaviśeṣādhivacanāśrayeṣvakṣareṣu a i u ityevamādiṣu /
SA01abhsubhu:37_6: paryāyākṣaraṇatāmupādāyeti yathā cakṣuścakṣurityetasmātparyāyādanyeṣvapi netrākṣinayanalocanādiṣu paryāyāntareṣu kṣarati,
SA01abhsubhu:37_7: tairapi tatsaṃjñānāt / naivaṃ a ityetadakṣaraṃ a ityetaṃ paryāyaṃ mukttvā paryāyāntareṇa śakyate jñāpayitum,
SA01abhsubhu:38_0: prabandhānupacchede pravṛttivyavasthānamekasmin kṣaṇe vyavacchinne vā tadupacārābhāvāt hetuphalanānātvamiṣṭasya phalasya sucaritamaniṣṭasya duścaritamityevamādi /
SA01abhsubhu:38_5: hetuphalasya prabandhena pravṛttau satyāṃ yattatra hetuphalamutpannaniruddhaṃ so 'tītaḥ kāla iti prajñapyate,
SA01abhsubhu:38_11: hetuphalapratyayānāṃ [Abhidh-s-bh_11] samavadhānaṃ tadyathā vijñānākhyasya hi hetuphalasyendriyāparibhedo vipayābhāsagamanaṃ tajjñānaṃ manaskārapratyupasthānaṃ ceti /
SA01abhsubhu:39_0: ityevamete cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmavasthāsu prajñapanātsarve prajñaptisanto veditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:39_3: sthityavasthāyāmekaḥ / sādṛśyāvasthāyāmekaḥ / lakṣaṇāvasthāyāṃ catvāraḥ / vyavahārāvasthāyāṃ trayaḥ / alābhāvasthāyāmekaḥ / hetuphalāvasthāyāṃ śeṣā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:42_0: upāttamādi spaṣṭatvaṃ bījaṃ karma na yujyate /
SA01abhsubhu:43_1_0: tadyathāntareṇālayavijñānaṃ āśrayopādānāsaṃbhavataḥ ādipravṛtyasaṃbhavataḥ spaṣṭapravṛttyasaṃbhavato bījatvāsaṃbhavataḥ karmāsaṃbhavataḥ

SA01abhsubhu:44_7: idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇam / api ca pratiniyatāśrayāḥ ṣaḍvijñānakāyāḥ pravartante,
SA01abhsubhu:44_8: tatra yena yenāśrayeṇa yadvijñānaṃ pravartate tadeva tenopāttaṃ syādavaśiṣṭasyānupāttateti na yujyate,
SA01abhsubhu:44_10: idaṃ caturtha kāraṇam / api ca punaḥ punarāśrayasyopādāna doṣaḥ prasajyate /
SA01abhsubhu:44_11: tathāhi cakṣurvijñānamekadā pravartate ekadā na pravarttate evamavaśiṣṭāni /
SA01abhsubhu:44_12: idaṃ pañcamaṃ kāraṇam / iti pūrvakarmapravarttamānapratyahetuto 'pi kuśalākuśalato 'pi tajjātyanupalaṃbhato 'pi pratiniyatāśrayato 'pi punaḥ punarupādānadoṣato 'pi na yujyate /
SA01abhsubhu:45_1: sa cetkaścidvadedyadyālaya vijñānamasti tena dvayoḥ vijñānayoḥ yugapatpravṛttirbhaviṣyati /
SA01abhsubhu:45_2: sa idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ - adoṣa eva bhavāndoṣasaṃjñī /
SA01abhsubhu:45_4: tatkasya hetoḥ / tathāhyekatyasya yugapadradṣṭukāmasya yāvadvijñātukāmasyādita itaretaravijñānapravṛttirna yujyate /
SA01abhsubhu:45_5: tathāhi tatra manaskāro 'pi nirviśiṣṭa indriyamapi viṣayo 'pi /
SA01abhsubhu:46_0: kena kāraṇenāsatyāṃ yugapadvijñānapravṛttau manovijñānasya cakṣurādivijñānasahānucarasya spaṣṭatvaṃ na saṃbhavati /

SA01abhsubhu:48_2: etā vijñaptayaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe yugapatpravartamānā upalabhyante /
SA01abhsubhu:48_3: na caikasya vijñānasyaikasmin kṣaṇe idamevaṃrūpaṃ vyatibhinnaṃ karma yujyate /
SA01abhsubhu:49_1_0: tathāhyekatyasya yoniśo vāyoniśo vā cintayato vānuvitarkayato vā samāhitacetaso vāsamāhitacetaso vā ye kāye kāyānubhavā utpadyante
SA01abhsubhu:50_1: tathāhya saṃjñisamāpannasya vā nirodhasamāpannasya vā vijñānameva kāyādapakrāntaṃ syāt /

SA01abhsubhu:51_2: adhodehaṃ vā / na ca manovijñānaṃ kadācinna pravartate /
SA01abhsubhu:51_3: ato 'pyālayavijñānasyaiva dehopādāna kasya vigamāddehaśītatā upa[la]bhyate dehāpratisaṃvedanā ca /
SA01abhsubhu:52_0: mano nirvacanata ālaṃbanataḥ saṃprayogataḥ pravṛttikālataśca nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:52_4: śaikṣasyāprahīṇatvāt / asaṃjñisamāpattito [Abhidh-s-bh_14] nirodhasamāpatteḥ śāntataratvaṃ tadasamudācārādeva veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:55_2: ananyathīma vatā sadaiva bhāvanāṃ nirātmatayā draṣṭavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:55_7: na dharmatā cittasya / prakṛtiprabhāsvarā hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmateti /
SA01abhsubhu:55_10: bhūtaṃ yadaviparītam, tasya koṭiḥ paryantaḥ, nairātmyātpareṇa tattvāparyepaṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:55_11: ākāśaṃ rūpābhāva iti rūpasyava viparyayeṇābhāvalakṣaṇo yo dharmo manovijñānaviṣayastadākāśam /
SA01abhsubhu:55_16: te 'pi śaśaviṣāṇādayo nāsyaiva vidyamānasya rūpasya viparyayeṇa,
SA01abhsubhu:55_20: na hi te 'bhāvalakṣaṇā iti / yo nirodho na ca visaṃyoga ityanuśayāsamuddhātāt /
SA01abhsubhu:56_0: dvayamidaṃ prahātavyam - kleśāśca tadāśrayabhūtaṃ ca vastu veditam /
SA01abhsubhu:57_1: dharmadhātunā sa eva, mana āyatanena sapta vijñānadhātava ityevaṃ sarvadharmāstrayo bhavanti /
SA01abhsubhu:59_0: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ dvitve sati kathaṃ dhātūnāṃ naikaviṃśatitvam /

SA01abhsubhu:61_0: ekaikenendriyadvāreṇa vicitraviṣayapratyupasthāne tatprakāreṣu kiṃ krameṇa vijñānānyutpadyante āhosyidyugapadekam /
SA01abhsubhu:62_2: yathā svaprade śamavaṣṭabhya pradīpapratānavat śabdapratānasyotpādo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:62_3: yattvāsannatiraskṛtasya śabdasyāspaṣṭaṃ śravaṇaṃ bhavati tacchabdasya pratighātitvādāvaraṇasauṣiryasvalpoktito veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:63_0: ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ kati vijñānāni savikalpakāni katyavikalpakāni /
SA01abhsubhu:63_3: tatra svabhāvavikalpaḥ pratyutpanneṣu saṃskāreṣvanubhūyamāneṣu yaḥ svalakṣaṇākāro vikalpaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:63_6: / api khalu sapta vikalpāḥ ālaṃbane svarasavāho vikalpaḥ sanimitto 'nimittaḥ paryeṣakaḥ pratyavekṣakaḥ kliṣṭo 'kliṣṭaśca vikalpaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:63_10: animitto 'nāgataviṣayo manorathākāro vikalpaḥ śeṣā abhinirūpaṇāvikalpasvabhāvā veditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:64_0: yadā rūpādiprativijñaptikaṃ vijñānaṃ tatkena kāraṇena cakṣurādivijñānamityucyate na rūpādibhijñānamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:64_3: āśrayadeśe vijñānotpattitaḥ, sati ca tasmistadbhāvāt / tathāhi sati cakṣuṣi cakṣurvijñānamavaśyamutpadyate anandhānāmanandhato 'ndhakārasyāpi darśanāt /

SA01abhsubhu:353_2: catvāri kathaṃ kṛtvā / dharmakuśalo laghu gṛhṇāti bāhuśrutyātprāyeṇa bhinnapadavyañjanatayā /
SA01abhsubhu:353_3: arthakuśalo bahu gṛhṇāti, abhidharmādilakṣaṇajñatvāt, skandhadhātvādikathāvastvadhikāreṇa prabhūtagranthasaṃkalanataḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:354_0: dharmavihārī bhikṣurdharmavihāri bhikṣuriti bhadantocyata ityatra sūtre bhagavatā samastena śrutacintābhāvanāvihāreṇa dharmavihāro bhavati,
SA01abhsubhu:354_2: tatra paryāptisvādhyāyadeśanābahulā vitarkaṇā bahulāścetyanena kevalaṃ śrutacintāprayuktā na bhāvanāprayuktā yogādiriñcanādato [na] dharmavihāriṇo vyavasthāpyante /
SA01abhsubhu:354_3: yo 'pi kaścicchrutacintāmanāgamya kevalaṃ bhāvanāprayuktaḥ syātso 'pi na dharmavihārī vyavasthāpyate /
SA01abhsubhu:354_4: tata eva tāvaddharmavihāriṇaṃ bhikṣumārabhya iha tu bhikṣurddharmaṃ paryāpnoti sūtraṃ geyamiti vistareṇoktvā paścādāha na riñcati yogamityevamādi,
SA01abhsubhu:354_5: yathā vijñāyeta śrutaṃ cintāṃ bhāvanāṃ cāgamya tadubhayavihāreṇa dharmavihārīti /
SA01abhsubhu:354_6: na riñcati yogamityevamādinā samādhiprayogāsaṃtuṣṭibhyāṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ saṃdarśitam /
SA01abhsubhu:354_7: samādhiprayogaḥ [Abhidh-s-bh_102] punardvividhaḥ saṃdarśitaḥ sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogasaṃgṛhītaśca na riñcati yogamityanena,
SA01abhsubhu:356_0: tatra saṃkhyā dvividhā, gaṇanāsaṃkhyā tanmātrasaṃkhyā ca /
SA01abhsubhu:356_2: sarvākārayorvodhisattvābhyudayaniḥśreyasamārgayostisṛbhistisṛbhiśca saṃgrahāt ṣaḍevapāramitā na bhūyasyo nālpoyasya itīyaṃ tanmātrasaṃkhyā /
SA01abhsubhu:361_1: yadbodhisattvasya bodhisattvadharmatāyāṃ vyavasthitasya bodhicittaṃ niśritya karuṇāpuraḥsareṇa cetasā sarvāstiparityāge kāyavāṅmanaskarma /
SA01abhsubhu:361_2: evaṃ ca kṛtvā dānapāramitāyāḥ lakṣaṇaṃ gotrataḥ praṇidhānata āśayato vastutaḥ svabhāvataśca nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:361_5: sarvāstiparityāgo vastu, kāyavāṅmanaskarmasvabhāva ityevaṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitā vistareṇa veditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:361_6_0: ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ / śīlakṣāntivīryapāramitāsu yathākramaṃ sarvasaṃvarasamādānānurakṣāyāṃ sarvāpakāraduḥkhamarṣaṇādhivāsanāyāṃ
SA01abhsubhu:361_8: prajñāpāramitā[yāṃ] sarvākārakāyavāṅmanaskarmavibhutve yaḥ sarvākāro dharmapravicaya iti vaktavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:362_0: punaryaddānaṃ sarvajñatāmārabhya sarvajñatāyai saṃvartate sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti sarvajñatākṛtyaṃ ca karoti taddānapārimitetyucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:362_1: etāni punaścatvāri padāni yathākramamārambhato vāsanātaḥ kāyato nisyandataśca veditavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:362_5: tadeva yadā paripūrṇaṃ bhavati tadā dharmakāyapariniṣpādanayogena sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti /
SA01abhsubhu:363_1: śīlānurakṣī - ākruṣṭena mayā na pratyākroṣṭavyam - ityevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ kṣamo bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:363_4: saṃpannadhyānaśca samāhitacitto yathābhūtajñānāllokottarāṃ prajñāṃ pratilabhata iti /
SA01abhsubhu:364_0: punaruttarottarādhārataḥ, śīlaṃ dānasyādhāra evaṃ yāvatprajñā dhyānasya /
SA01abhsubhu:364_7: dhyāyinī vīryaviśuddhiḥ, saha sukhena saumanasyena sarvakuśaladharmaprayogāt /
SA01abhsubhu:365_3: sarvasūkṣmā tu prajñā, ataḥ sarvapaścādvyavasthāpyata iti /
SA01abhsubhu:366_7: upāyaparamatā, phalaparamatā ca / paricayaḥ punardīrghakāladānato veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:367_12: niṣpattiparamatvaṃ daśamyāṃ bhūmau tāthāgatyāṃ ca bodhisattvapariniṣpattyā buddhapariniṣpattyā ceti /
SA01abhsubhu:368_0: punaḥ paramairīhitā itāśceti pāramitāḥ, buddhabodhisattvaiśceṣṭitā gatāścetyarthaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:370_0: punaḥ parānātmānaṃ ca paramāmīti tārayantoti pāramitāḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:371_4: kṣaticittaṃ punaryenāpa kāriṇāṃ pratyapakāraḥ kriyate tasyāgatasyānayā vilopanaṃ tiraskaraṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:371_5: kṣatameṣāṃ vairaṃ vidyata iti kṣatinasteṣāmabhayaprakāśanaṃ kṣemasyāviṣkaraṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:371_7: vṛddhaye īhā kuśaladharmasamudāgamāya dvābhyāṃ samyakprahāṇābhyāṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:371_10: yamanaṃ vikṣepataḥ, saṃyamanaṃ cittasya, vinayanaṃ paryavasthānānāṃ viṣkambhaṇam,
SA01abhsubhu:371_13: tatra parapraṇītajñānaṃ parato ghoṣānvayā yoniśomanaskārasaṃprayuktā prajñā,
SA01abhsubhu:373_1: hetusaṃniśritā yo gotrabalena pāramitāsu pratipattyabhyāsaḥ vipākasaṃniśritā ya ātmabhāvasaṃpattibalena /
SA01abhsubhu:375_0: āśayasaṃniśritā pāramitābhāvanā ṣaḍākārā - atṛptāśayena vaipulyāśayena muditāśayenopakarāśayena nirlepāśayena kalyāṇāśayena ca /
SA01abhsubhu:375_1_0: tatra bodhisattvasya dāne 'tṛptāśayo yadbodhisattvasyaikakṣaṇe gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānlokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇān pratipādayato
SA01abhsubhu:375_2: yathā caikasattvasyaivaṃ yāvān sattvadhāturanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:375_3: tamanena paryāyeṇa pratipādayedatṛpta eva bodhisattvasya dānāśaya iti /
SA01abhsubhu:375_5: na ca bodhisattva evaṃrūpāṃ dānaparaṃparāṃ kṣaṇamātramapi hāpayati vicchinattyābodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāditi /
SA01abhsubhu:375_6: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne vipulāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:375_8: na ca te sattvāstena dānenānugṛhyamāṇā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:375_9: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne muditāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:375_10: upakaratarāṃśca bodhisattvastān sattvānātmanaḥ samanupaśyati yeṣāṃ tathā dānenopakaroti nātmānam,
SA01abhsubhu:375_12: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne upakarāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:375_13: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu tathā vipulamapi dānamayaṃ puṇyamabhisaṃskṛtya pratikāreṇa vārthī bhavati vipākena veti /
SA01abhsubhu:375_14: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:375_15: yadbodhisattvastathā vipulasyāpi dānaskandhasya vipākaṃ sattveṣvevābhinandati nātmanaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:375_17: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:376_1_1: lokadhātāvāgniparipūrṇe caturvidhamīryāpathaṃ kalpayannekaṃ śīlapāramitākṣaṇaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitākṣaṇaṃ bhāvayet,
SA01abhsubhu:376_2: etena paryāyeṇa yāvacchīlaskandho yāvatprajñāskandho yenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
SA01abhsubhu:376_4: atṛpta evaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāmāśayo yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanā[yā]māśaya iti /
SA01abhsubhu:376_5: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattva[sya] śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāmatṛptāśayo yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāvanāyām /
SA01abhsubhu:376_6: yadbodhisattvastāṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāparaṃparāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāparaṃparamā bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanānna bhraṃśayati na vicchinattīti /
SA01abhsubhu:376_7: ya evaṃrūpa āśāyo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ vipulāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:376_8: muditataraśca bodhisattvo bhavati tayā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanayā sattvānanugṛhṇan,
SA01abhsubhu:376_9: na tveva te sattvā anugṛhyamāṇā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:376_10: ya evaṃrūpaāśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ muditāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:376_11: upakaratarāṃśca sa bodhisattvastān sattvānātmanaḥ samanupaśyati yeṣāṃ tathā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanayā upakarāti nātmānam,
SA01abhsubhu:376_13: ya evarūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāmupakarāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:376_14: na ca bodhisattvastathā vipulamapi śīlapāramitāmayaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāmayaṃ puṇyamabhisaṃskṛtya tasya pratikāreṇa [Abhidh-s-bh_108] vārthī bhavati vipākena veti /
SA01abhsubhu:376_15: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:376_16: tatra yadbodhisattva evaṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāmayasya yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāmayasya puṇyaskandhasya vipākaṃ sattveṣvevābhinandati nātmanaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:376_18: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:378_2: tatra kāyavibhutvaṃ tāthāgatau dvau kāyau draṣṭavyau svābhāvikaḥ sāṃbhogikaśca /
SA01abhsubhu:378_3: tatra caryāvibhutvaṃ nairmāṇikaḥ kāyo draṣṭavyo yena sarvākārāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sahadhārmikacaryāṃ darśayati /
SA01abhsubhu:379_2: cittopastambhaḥ, kuśalopastambhaḥ, sugatyupastambhaḥ, bodhyupastambhaḥ, karuṇopastambhaḥ, sattvāparityāgopastambhaḥ, hīnacittaparityāgopastambhaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:380_0: pratyekaṃ dānādīnāṃ traivighyāt tribhistribhirupastambhairyathākramaṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:380_1: tatra trividhaṃ dānam - abhayadānaṃ dharmadānamāmiṣadānaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:380_2: trividhaṃ śīlam - saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:380_4: trividhaṃ vīryam - saṃnāhavīryaṃ prayogavīryaṃ sattvārthakriyāvīryaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:380_5: trividhaṃ dhyānam - dṛṣṭadharmasukhāvihārāya dhyānamabhijñānirhārāya dhyānaṃ sattvārthakriyāyai ca dhyānam /
SA01abhsubhu:380_6: trividhā prajñā - saṃvṛtyālaṃbanā paramārthālaṃbanā sattvārthālambanā ca /
SA01abhsubhu:381_2: abhayadānaṃ cittopastambhaḥ daurmanasyaviśeṣā[pa]gamāya cetasa āśvāsāya saṃhārāt /
SA01abhsubhu:383_0: kuśalamūlākṣayatā sarvasattveṣu kriyārthādhikāritayā yāvatsāraṃ nirupadhiśeṣe 'pi nirvāṇadhātāvaparityāgaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:384_0: gaṇaparikarṣaṇaṃ karmaṃ adhigamaṃ niśritya vineyānāmasamāhitasya cittasya samādhānāya samāhitasya vā cittasya vimokṣāyāvavādānuśāsanopradānam,
SA01abhsubhu:387_0: punaḥ prabhedaḥ sapta dānāmi - mūladānaṃ gotrāvasthasya bodhisattvasya dānapāramitā,
SA01abhsubhu:387_7: vinā vāhyenopakaraṇaparigraheṇa gaganagañjādisamādhibhirākāśe pāṇiṃ saṃcārya yatheṣṭaṃ ratnādivarṣaṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:388_8: tadanena viśiṣṭena cittotpādena pāramitānāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:388_9: tāsāṃ kāraṇabhāvāt / svaparārthasaṃgraho yaddānenaiśvarya parigṛhaṇātyayaṃ svārthaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:388_10: yatpunaḥ parānupakaraṇopasaṃhāreṇānugṛhṇātyayaṃ svārthaḥ evamavaśiṣṭābhiḥ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:388_16: ityevaṃ tathatāsamyajjñānasvabhāvataḥ paramārtho dānādibhiḥ saṃgṛhīto veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:389_0: vipakṣo dānādīnāṃ yathākramaṃ mātsaryadauḥśīlye krodhakauśīdye vikṣepadauḥprajñe /
SA01abhsubhu:389_1: api khalu yāvantaḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ pāramitābhiḥ saṃgṛhītāsteṣāṃ yo vipakṣo jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca sa tāsāṃ vipakṣo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:390_4_1: maheśākhyatā ca yathākramaṃ dānādīnāṃ vipākaphalaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:392_4: tatraiva yā maitracittasya paratravighātotpīḍāviheṭhasaṃvaraṇatā sā śīlapāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:392_6: tatraiva yā bhūyo bhūyaścittasyotsahanatā sā vīryapāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:392_7: tatraiva yā cittasyaikāgratā kuśalādbahiravisaraṇatā sā dhyānapāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:392_8: tatraiva yā yathāvaddhetu phalasugṛhītatā dṛṣṭyaparāmarṣaṇatā sā prajñāpāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:392_9: evaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyamubhayadānaṃ sarvajñajñānamiti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:393_1: anukāraprabhedena ca / tatra dānādīnāṃ svabhāvo yathākramaṃ visargaḥ saṃvaro marṣaṇābhyutsāhaścitasthitiḥ pravicayaśca /
SA01abhsubhu:393_3: tatra dānādīnāmupayogaḥ samādāpanā varṇavāditā sumanojñatā ca /
SA01abhsubhu:393_4: tatra dānādīnāṃ ropaṇā yā parasaṃtāne pratiṣṭhāpanā /
SA01abhsubhu:393_6: tadanyāḥ pañcābhayadānam, sarvāḥ saddharmadānaṃ parasaṃtāne ropaṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:394_4: syāddānapāramitā na śīlapāramitā śīlapāramitayāsaṃgṛhītā yā dānapāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:394_6: yaddānaṃ sarvā sā pāramitā, yā dānapāramitā sarvaṃ taddānamiti catuṣkoṭikam /
SA01abhsubhu:394_8: syāt pāramitā na dānaṃ śīlādayo mahābodhipariṇāmitāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:394_9: syāddānaṃ ca pāramitā ca [Abhidh-s-bh_112] bodhipariṇāmitāni dānādīni /
SA01abhsubhu:394_10: syānna dānaṃ na pāramitā uktavinirmuktā dharmāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:394_12: yo dānaṃ samācarati sarvo 'sau dānapāramitānvayaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavatīti catuṣkoṭikam /
SA01abhsubhu:395_0: viśeṣato vaipulye audāryagāmbhīryadeśanā tatphalasya sarvajñatvasya paramodāragambhīratvātphalānurūpyeṇa hetunirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:396_0: ekatyānāṃ tadanadhimokṣe trāsaḥ bodhisattvagotravaikalyaṃ prakṛtyā hīnacittatayā gāmbhīryaudāryadeśanāṃ nādhimoktuṃ śaknuvanti /
SA01abhsubhu:396_3: adhimucyamānānāmapyekatyānāmaniryāṇaṃ nītārtha sūtrama[na]nviṣya svayaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarṣasthāyitayā yathārutamarthābhiniveśāta /
SA01abhsubhu:396_5: evamanye 'pi yathārutārthābhiniveśino mahāyāne na niryāntotiveditavyaṃ nānābhiprāyabhāṣitatvāt mahāyānasyeti /
SA01abhsubhu:396_6: idaṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mahādharmādarśe dharmaparyāye - bodhisattvasya yathārutamayoniśo dharmān vicinvato 'ṣṭāviṃśatirasaddṛṣṭaya utpadyante /
SA01abhsubhu:397_2_0: tatra nisvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā ityevamādikaṃ mahāyāne rutamupalabhya tadabhisaṃdhyakuśalāḥ yathārutamevāsyārthamadhimucyamānā
SA01abhsubhu:397_2_1: abhāva evāyaṃ bhagavatā deśitaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanutpāda evetyabhāvādinimittamabhiniviśante saiṣāṃ bhavati nimittadṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:397_3: ta evamabhāvādinimittamabhiniviśamānāstrīnsvabhāvānavadante parikalpitaṃ svabhāvaṃ paratantraṃ pariniṣpannaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:397_4: tatrāyaṃ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo yadrūpamiti vā yāvannirvāṇāmiti vābhilāpaprajñaptimātrabhabhūto niḥśarīrārtho yadbālā rūpādilakṣaṇaṃ samāropattaḥ parikalpayanti /
SA01abhsubhu:397_6: tatrāyaṃ pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvo yatsarvadharmāṇāṃ tattvaṃ [Abhidh-s-bh_113] tathatā /
SA01abhsubhu:397_8: ta evaṃ sarvathā sarvadharmānapavadamānāstasyā apavādadṛṣṭeḥ pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ kāṃcideva yuktiṃ parigṛhṇanti,
SA01abhsubhu:397_9: ye 'pi nītārthāḥ sūtrāntā nirabhilāpadharmatādyotakāstānapi sarvān svadṛṣṭayānulomyena pariṇāmayanti /
SA01abhsubhu:397_10: te eva dve dṛṣṭo bhavataḥ parigrahadṛṣṭiḥ pariṇatidṛṣṭiśca /
SA01abhsubhu:397_11: te punarevaṃdṛṣṭayo bhavanti - ya etāmīdṛśīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ niśritya kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā samācarati sa niravadya eva bhavati nirdoṣaḥ sarvamevāsya tatkalyāṇatāṃ yāti,
SA01abhsubhu:397_13: te caivaṃ svadṛṣṭāvabhiniviṣṭāstad dṛṣṭiviparyayeṇa skandhādidharmavyavasthāpakaṃ śrāvakapiṭakamavajānanti,
SA01abhsubhu:397_15: te ete dve dṛṣṭī bhavato 'vajñādṛṣṭiḥ prakopadṛṣṭiśca /
SA01abhsubhu:397_16: svadṛṣṭyanusāreṇa caite yathāvacchūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vyavasthāpayamānā atallakṣaṇe tallakṣaṇasaṃjñino viparītameṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpayanti,
SA01abhsubhu:397_17: evaṃcittāśca bhavanti - yasyāmīdṛśyāṃ dharmatāyāmavatarantyavatārayanti vā sarve te 'prameyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavantītyevamete dṛṣṭī viparītadṛṣṭiḥ prasavadṛṣṭiśca /
SA01abhsubhu:397_18: yadā punaste tāṃ dṛṣṭimārabhya paraṃranuyujyante tadā na kiṃcitsvayamicchantyabhyupagantum,
SA01abhsubhu:397_21: te caivamabhimānino bhavanti - ya evaṃ pratipadyante [te] samyagbuddhān bhagavataḥ pūjayanti satkurvantītyeṣāṃ satkāradṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:397_22: aviparītadharmatākuśalaiśca tatā dṛṣṭervivecyamānāḥ sūpapannayā prasiddhayā yuktayā pratyāyamānā api tāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ na kathaṃcit parityajanti,
SA01abhsubhu:397_24: etāsāṃ ca yathānirdiṣṭānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ yadvāsanādauṣṭhulyaṃ sā mūladṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:397_25: eta eva ca saptadaśadṛṣṭayo doṣodbhāvanāmukhenāvaśiṣṭābhiḥ dṛṣṭibhiḥ punarnidiśyante /
SA01abhsubhu:397_47: ata evānantaraṃ tatraiva sūtra uktamitīmāḥ saptadaśa samānāḥ daśa bhavanti,
SA01abhsubhu:398_2: yena vā svabhāvenaite pūrvamabhūvanna tena svena bhāvena bhūyaḥ śakyamebhirbhavitumiti niḥsvabhāvāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:398_4: yādṛśo vādṛṣṭasatyairdharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo lakṣaṇamabhilāpaprapañcavāsanāmukhena gṛhyate tena bālagrāhānurūpeṇa svabhāvena vi[ra]hitatvānniḥ svabhāvāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:399_0: api khalu sarvadharmā ucyante trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:399_1: tatra parikalpitasya svalakṣaṇameva nāstyataḥ svalakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:399_2: paratantrasya svayamutpattirnāsti pratyayāpekṣaṇādato nāsya svena bhāvena bhāva ityutpattiniḥ svabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:399_3: pariniṣpanno viśuddhyālaṃbanatvāt paratantraparikalpitalakṣaṇābhāvasvabhāvatvācca paramārthaścaiṣa niḥsvabhāvatāprabhāvitaśceti paramārthaniḥsvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:399_4: ityevaṃ ca kṛtvā niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā draṣṭavyāḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:400_0: api khalu mahāyāne tathāgatasya sarve 'bhiprāyāḥ saṃkṣepeṇa catvāro bhavanti /
SA01abhsubhu:400_1: tadyathā samatābhiprāyo yadāha - ahameva tasmin samaye vipaśyī [Abhidh-s-bh_115] samyaksaṃbuddho 'bhūvamiti,
SA01abhsubhu:400_2: avaśiṣṭadharmakāyatvāt / kālāntarābhiprāyoyadāha - ye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau praṇidhānaṃ kariṣyanti te tatropa patsyanta iti,
SA01abhsubhu:400_3: vimalacandraprabhavasya ca nāmadheyagrahaṇamātreṇa niyato bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti,
SA01abhsubhu:400_4: kālāntareṇetyabhiprāyaḥ / arthāntarābhiprāyo yadāha - niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā ityevamādi,
SA01abhsubhu:400_5: ayathārutārthatvāt / pudgalāśayābhiprāyo yattadeva kuśalamūlaṃ kasyacitpraśaṃsanti kasyacidvigarha te 'lpamātrasaṃtuṣṭasya /
SA01abhsubhu:400_8: kaukṛtyenāvṛtasya ye buddhabodhisattveṣvapakāramapi kariṣyanti te sarve svargopagā bhaviṣyantītyāha /
SA01abhsubhu:400_10: ekaṃ ca yānaṃ na dvitīyamastīti deśayati śrāvakatvāśayatyājanārtham /
SA01abhsubhu:402_1: kleśena ca susaṃkliṣṭā labhante bodhimuttamām // iti /
SA01abhsubhu:403_1_0: vikṣepo hi visāraścetasaḥ viparyāse ca susthitāḥ iti nityasukhaśucyātmaviparyayeṇānityādike viparyāse ca susthitā aparihāṇitaḥ
SA01abhsubhu:403_1_1: kleśena ca susaṃkliṣṭāḥ iti dīrghaduṣkara vyāyāmaśrameṇātyartha parikliṣṭāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:404_0: vaipulye dharmasamādhikuśalabodhisattvanirdeśaḥ śamathānuśaṃsaṃ vipaśyanānuśaṃsaṃ tadubhayānuśaṃsaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:404_2: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe prakarṣagāminyā prasrabdhyā nirantaramāśrayaspharaṇāt pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvadauṣṭhulyāśraya drāvaṇam,
SA01abhsubhu:404_7_0: tadubhayānuśaṃso dharmakāyasya jñeyāvaraṇa prahāṇāśrayaparivṛttisaṃgṛhītasya paripūraye daśamyāṃ bhūmau pariniṣpattaye vā
SA01abhsubhu:405_0: tadetatpañcavidhāyā bhāvanāyāḥ phalaṃ pañcavidhaṃ nirvartata iti saṃdarśitam /
SA01abhsubhu:406_0: kena kāraṇena tulye dharmakāyaniṣyandatve vaipulyadharmo dhūpamālyādibhiḥ pūjyo na tathā śrāvakayānadharmaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:409_2: rūpādīnāṃ bahūnāṃ bahudhābhinnalakṣaṇasaṃjñānāmekayā sāmudāyikyā sattvaprajñaptyākṛcchreṇa ehi yāhi ityevamādisaṃvyavaharaṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:409_3: lokānuvṛttyartham, na hi loke dharmamātrasaṃjñābhiḥ sarvaḥ saṃvyavahāro nirūḍhaḥ kiṃtarhi prāyeṇa sattvasaṃjñayā /
SA01abhsubhu:409_5: anutrāsārtham, pratītyasamutpādadharmatāyāma kovidāḥ sahasāditaḥ sarvathā sattvābhāvaṃ śrutvottrasyeyuriti /
SA01abhsubhu:409_7: itarathā hi sattvaprajñaptimantareṇa saṃkleśavyavadānalakṣaṇamātradeśanāyāṃ satyāmamuṣmin saṃtāne 'mī doṣāḥ prahīṇā amī vā guṇā utpannā iti na śakyate vijñātumiti /
SA01abhsubhu:411_7: so 'yaṃ prakṛtisthaḥ, utkaṭe 'pi vastuni pūrvapratipakṣābhyāsavaśena prakṛtyā mṛdukleśasamudācārāditi /
SA01abhsubhu:412_5: vyākaraṇaṃ ca pratyalabhata ityaṣṭābhyāṃ bhūmāvanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhata ityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:413_0: asaṃbhṛtasaṃbhārādayo mokṣabhāgīyānāṃ ca mṛdumadhyādhi mātratayā nirvedhabhāgīyotpādanaṃ satyābhisamayaṃ ca pratiniyatāniyatatajjanmakālikatvādyathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:415_1: api jātisahasrāṇi nāsau gacchati durgatim // iti //
SA01abhsubhu:417_2: yanmadhyaṃ tatprākarṣikam, tataḥ tatprakṛṣṭataratvāt / yadadhimātraṃ satyaprativedhāya tatraiva janmani saṃvartate tatprātivedhikam /
SA01abhsubhu:417_3: tatpunaryadaniyatagotrāṇāṃ bodhiviśeṣāya [Abhidh-s-bh_119] pariṇāmyate tacca pratyekabuddhānāmanācāryakābhisaṃbodhāya janmāntare pariṇamati tadanyapāriṇāmikam /
SA01abhsubhu:418_2: aṣṭau vimokṣā rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatītyevamādayaḥ paścānnirdekṣyante /
SA01abhsubhu:418_5: srotāpattiphalapratipannaka ekāsanikaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyamārabhya yāvadādyaṃ phalaṃ na prāpnoti /
SA01abhsubhu:419_2_0: yastu pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa kāmāvacarān bhāvanāprahātavyān ṣaṭprakārān prahāya yatra yo vītarāgo bhavan paścātsamyaktvaṃ
SA01abhsubhu:419_2_1: niyāmamavakrāmati sa ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe sakṛdāgāmyeva bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:419_3: navāpi prakārān prahāya kāmavītarāgo bhavan yo niyāmamavakrāmati so 'nāgāmyeva bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:420_3: uccalito 'pi kathaṃcinmokṣaṃ prati śīlavrataparāmarśena vicikitsayā cāsanmārgābhiniveśātsanmārgasaṃśayanācca mithyā niryāti samyaktvamaniryāti /
SA01abhsubhu:421_0: sakṛdā[gā]miphalapratipannakaḥ darśanamārgādūrdhvaṃ kāmāvacarasya yāvanmadhyamadhyasya kleśaprakārasya prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:421_1: sakṛdāgāmī madhyamṛdoḥ kleśaprakārasya prahāṇa mārga parisamāptau yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:421_2: anāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalādūrdhvaṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ mṛdvadhimātramṛdumadhyayoḥ [Abhidh-s-bh_120] kleśaprakārayoḥ prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:421_3: anāgāmī navamasya mṛdumṛdoḥ kleśaprakārasya prahāṇāya mārgaparisamāptau yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:422_0: sarvakāmāvacarabhāvanāprahātavyaprahāṇe 'pi pañcānāmavarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇādanāgāmivacanaṃ sūtre eṣāṃ gatidhātvavarakāraṇatvena prādhānyāt /
SA01abhsubhu:424_0: kulaṃ kulaḥ kulaḥ srotāpanna eva sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannako deveṣu vā manuṣyeṣu vā niyamena dvau bhavau saṃsṛtya parinirvāti /
SA01abhsubhu:424_1: ekavīcikaḥ sakṛdāgāmyevānāgāmiphalapratipannako deveṣvevaikaṃ bhavaṃ saṃsṛtyaṃ parinirvāti /
SA01abhsubhu:424_3_0: antarāparinirvāyī yena kleśāvedhenopapattideśaṃ gatvā pratisandadhyāttatparikṣaye sati yenānuśayamātreṇa maraṇādūrdhva skandhānabhinirvartayan
SA01abhsubhu:424_3_1: tadavaśeṣe satyantarābhavamabhinirvartya pūrvābhyastamārgasaṃmukhībhāvādeva sa viśiṣṭānuśayaprahāṇe parinirvāti /
SA01abhsubhu:424_9: bhavāgragaścaturthasya dhyānasyāvyavakīrṇabhāvitvāt kevalaṃ śuddhāvāsān parihṛtya tathaiva yāvadbhavāgraṃ gatvā parinirvāti /
SA01abhsubhu:424_10: vyavakīrṇabhāvitasya caturthasya dhyānasya mṛdvādipañcaprakārabhāvitatvādyathākramaṃ pañcasu śuddhāvāseṣūpapattirveditavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:425_4: dhyānavyāvartanakuśalatvāt / sattvaparipācanārthaṃ kāmadhātāvapi bodhisattva upapadyata iti veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:427_0: adhimukticārī bodhisattvagotre vyavasthita ādito mahābodhiprasthānamupādāya yāvatpramuditāṃ bhūmiṃ na praviśati,
SA01abhsubhu:427_5: animittacārī saptamyām, yatnaṃ kurvato yāvadicchaṃ nimittāsamudācārāt /
SA01abhsubhu:428_2: evaṃ yāvan mṛdumṛdūn darśanaprahātavyān na tu laukikamārgavadbhūmiprakārabhedena pṛthakpṛthagityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:428_3_0: tatredaṃ jñāpakaṃ yathoktamaṃgulyagrasūtre - “yatkiṃcidrūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamatītānāgatapratyutpannamiti vistareṇa yāvaddūre
SA01abhsubhu:428_3_1: yadvāntike tatsarvamekadhyamasaṃkṣipyaikaṃ [Abhidh-s-bh_122] bhāgaṃ karotyekaṃ piṇḍamekaṃ puñjamekaṃ rāśiṃ karotyekaṃ kṛtvātaḥ
SA01abhsubhu:428_6: madhyayostu na prajñāpyate, tayordṛṣṭasatyasya kāmavacarāṇāmeva bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ sāvaśeṣaniravaśeṣaprahāṇaprabhāvitatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:428_8: sa dṛṣṭe dharme yadyājñāṃ tārāgayati sarvato niḥśeṣamavītarāgatvātpraṇidhānavaśena kāmadhātāvupapadyate kṣipraparinirvāṇārtham /
SA01abhsubhu:429_1: tatra dharmābhisamayaḥ satyādhipateyeṣu sūtrādiṣu dharmeṣu paratoghoṣamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā dhimātrasyādhimuktiprasādasya paścimamokṣabhāgīyasaṃgṛhītasya pratilambhaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:429_5: sā punardharmanidhyānakṣāntistrividhena yoniśomanaskāreṇa prabhāvitā adhimātramṛdunā tajjanmakāleṣūṣmagateṣu,
SA01abhsubhu:429_9_0: tatra punaḥ satyavyavasthāpanānyabhisamayāntikāni saṃvṛtijñānāni pratilambhato lokottarajñānādhipatyena tadabījapoṣaṇānna
SA01abhsubhu:429_9_1: tu sammukhīkaroti ṣoḍaśānāṃ darśanamārgacittakṣaṇānāṃ nirantaratvena laukikacittānavakāśāt /
SA01abhsubhu:429_13: supratipannaḥ śrāvakasaṃgha ityevamavetya niścityāryaśrāvakasya buddhādiṣu prasādaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:429_14_0: asamudācārābhisamayo yasyākaraṇasaṃvarasyāyaṃkāntaśīla saṃgṛhītasya lābhāttadvipakṣanarakādyasamudācāraṃ pratyevaṃ niścayaḥ
SA01abhsubhu:429_14_1: pravarttate kṣoṇā me narakāḥ ityevamādiḥ so 'samudācārābhisamayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:429_15: niṣṭhābhisamayaḥ sarvadauṣṭhulyānāṃ pratiprasrabdhirityevamādiryathā mārgasatye niṣṭhāmārgo nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:429_16: eta eva saptābhisamayāḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ paratoghoṣamāgamya pratilambhataḥ śrāvakābhisamaya ityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:429_18_0: bodhisattvābhisamaya eṣu saptasvabhisamayeṣu bodhisattvasya yā samudāgamakṣāntiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhavinayopāyakauśalyārthaṃ
SA01abhsubhu:429_19: api khalu tatprathamato bodhisattvasya bhūmipraveśābhisamaya ityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:430_0: etaṃ cābhisamaya niśrityocyate - śrāvakābhisamayādbodhisattvābhisamasya kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ ālaṃbanaviśeṣato vaipulyālaṃbanatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:430_2: prativedhaviśeṣataḥ pudgaladharmanairātmyādhipateyadharmaprayogavedhato lokottareṇa jñānena tadubhayaprativedhāt abhyupagamaviśeṣataḥ svātmasamatayā sarvasattvābhyupagamāt /
SA01abhsubhu:430_14: bhogaviśeṣaḥ sadā bodhisattveḥ saha parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu vicitradharmasaṃbhogāt /
SA01abhsubhu:430_15: kamaviśeṣo yathārhaṃ nirmāṇeḥ samantādanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṛtyānuṣṭhānāditi /
SA01abhsubhu:430_18: miśropamiśrajñānaśaktilābhaviśeṣataḥ suviśuddhadharmadhātvekarasatayā tadāśritāsu sarvākāravarajñatāsu pratyekaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ sāmarthyāt /
SA01abhsubhu:430_21: abhisaṃbodhinirvāṇasaṃdarśanopāyaviśeṣato daśasu dikṣu yathāyogaṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu yāvadaparāntaṃ punaḥpunarbuddhotpādādi saṃdarśanena sarvavineyajanaparipācanavimocanāt /
SA01abhsubhu:430_25: apāyaparitrāṇaṃ darśanamārgotpādanena durgatisamatikramaṇāt satkāyaparitrāṇamarhattvasākṣātkaraṇena traidhātukavi mokṣāṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:431_0: vaiśaṃṣikaguṇā āryaśrāvakairbhāvanāmārge vābhinirhriyante 'śaikṣamārge vetyata eṣāṃ pṛṣṭhaniṣṭhābhisamayābhyāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:431_1: te punarmaitryādayo yathāsūtrāntareṣu nirdiṣṭāḥ śrāvakayāne mahāyāne ca tathaiva veditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:431_2: teṣāṃ cāya samāsena pañcabhirākārairyathāyogaṃ lakṣaṇanirdeśo veditavyaḥ - niśrayata ālaṃbanata ākārataḥ svabhāvataḥ sahāyataśca /
SA01abhsubhu:432_3: cittacaitasikāḥ sahāyā ityevaṃ karuṇādiṣu yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:432_4: upekṣayā sukhādiṣu sattveṣvanunayādyabhyupekṣaṇamaho vata saṃkleśādvimucyerannityayamākāro veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:433_0: aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ / rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatyayaṃ prathamo vimokṣa iti vistaraḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:433_1: tatra kathaṃ rūpītyucyate / svātmanyā rūpyasamāpattisaṃniśrayeṇa rūpasaṃjñāyā abhibhāvanādrūpasaṃjñāsaṃniveśanādvā draṣṭavyāni rūpasaṃjñāsaṃmukhī karaṇādityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:433_4: kathaṃ vimokṣa ityucyate / vimucyate 'nena nirmāṇāvaraṇāditi kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:433_6: śeṣaṃ pūrvavat / śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharata,
SA01abhsubhu:433_8: [Abhidh-s-bh_125] tathāhi śubhāni rūpāṇyapekṣya tadanyeṣvaśubhānīti bhavatyaśubhāni vāpekṣya śubhānīti nānapekṣyaikajātīyānāmeva darśane śubhāśubhatābuddhyabhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:433_10: śubhasaṃmatasyāpi tvaṅmātrasya keśādiṣaṭtriśadaśucidravyāntarabhāvādityevamanyonyaṃ sarvarūpāṇi miśrayitvā śubhataikarasākārayā saṃjñayā vimucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:433_11: tasyaivaṃ rūpādivimokṣavibhutvalābhinaḥ śubhāśubhanirmāṇāvaraṇaṃ ca prahīyate tatra ca saṃkleśotpattyāvaraṇam /
SA01abhsubhu:433_12: kaḥ punarnirmāṇe saṃkleśaḥ / śubharūpanirmāṇe ābhogaḥ, aśubharūpanirmāṇe prātikūlyamiti /
